TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ConfigurationPropertyAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class ConfigurationPropertyAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class ConfigurationPropertyAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 以声明方式指示 .NET Framework，以实例化配置属性。

span.span: Declaratively instructs the .NET Framework to instantiate a configuration property.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 你使用修饰配置属性，将指示.NET Framework 来实例化和初始化使用装饰参数的值的属性。You use the to decorate a configuration property, which will instruct the .NET Framework to instantiate and to initialize the property using the value of the decorating parameter. > [!NOTE] > 若要创建自定义配置元素的最简单方法是使用特性化 （声明性） 模型中。The simplest way to create a custom configuration element is to use the attributed (declarative) model. 声明的自定义的公共属性和修饰它们与属性。You declare the custom public properties and decorate them with the attribute. 对于每个使用此特性标记的属性，.NET Framework 使用反射读取装饰参数以及创建相关实例。For each property marked with this attribute, the .NET Framework uses reflection to read the decorating parameters and create a related instance. 你还可以使用的编程模型，在这种情况下它是你有责任声明自定义的公共属性，并返回它们的集合。You can also use the programmatic model, in which case it is your responsibility to declare the custom public properties and return their collection. .NET Framework 配置系统提供的自定义配置元素的创建过程中可以使用的属性类型。The .NET Framework configuration system provides attribute types that you can use during the creation of custom configuration elements. 有两种类型的属性类型：There are two kinds of attribute types: 1. 指示如何实例化自定义的配置元素属性的.NET Framework 类型。The types instructing the .NET Framework how to instantiate the custom configuration-element properties. 这些类型包括：These types include: - - 2. 指示如何验证自定义的配置元素属性的.NET Framework 类型。The types instructing the .NET Framework how to validate the custom configuration-element properties. 这些类型包括：These types include: - - - - - ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何定义自定义的属性对象使用属性。The following example shows how to define the properties of a custom object using the attribute. 此示例包含两个类。The example contains two classes. `UrlsSection`自定义类使用来定义其自己的属性。The `UrlsSection` custom class uses the to define its own properties. `UsingConfigurationPropertyAttribute`类使用`UrlsSection`读取和写入应用程序配置文件中的自定义部分。The `UsingConfigurationPropertyAttribute` class uses the `UrlsSection` to read and write the custom section in the application configuration file. [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.ConfigurationPropertyAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationPropertyAttribute/CS/customsection.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.ConfigurationPropertyAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationPropertyAttribute/VB/customsection.vb#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.ConfigurationPropertyAttribute#21](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationPropertyAttribute/CS/ConfigurationPropertyAttribute.cs#21)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.ConfigurationPropertyAttribute#21](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationPropertyAttribute/VB/ConfigurationPropertyAttribute.vb#21)] 下面是在前面的示例定义包含自定义的节的配置文件的摘录。The following is an excerpt of the configuration file containing the custom section as defined in the previous sample. ```
```

span.span: Gets or sets the default value for the decorated property.

span.span: The object representing the default value of the decorated configuration-element property.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，指示此属性集合是否为经过修饰的配置属性的默认属性集合。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this is the default property collection for the decorated configuration property.

value.span: 如果该属性表示元素的默认集合，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the property represents the default collection of an element; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果修饰的属性不是一个集合，属性值将被忽略。The property value is ignored if the decorated property is not a collection.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsKey { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示此属性是否是该经过修饰的元素属性的 Key 属性。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this is a key property for the decorated element property.

value.span: 如果此属性是该集合中元素的 Key 属性，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the property is a key property for an element of the collection; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性仅适用于修饰的属性是集合。The property applies only if the property you decorate is a collection. 如果属性不是一个集合，它不产生任何影响。It does not have any effect if the property is not a collection. 可以将多个元素标记为。Multiple elements can be marked as . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性。The following example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.ConfigurationPropertyAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationPropertyAttribute/CS/customsection.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.ConfigurationPropertyAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationPropertyAttribute/VB/customsection.vb#2)]
